content.title: Central Venous Access
content.statement: Central Venous Access is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Critical-Care that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Central Venous Access helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Central Venous Access include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Central Venous Access.

citations.source: UpToDate. (2024). Central Venous Access. Wolters Kluwer.
Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
